casebody.data:
Henry L. CASON, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 7933. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Dec. 5, 1935. Henry L. Cason, of Atlanta, Ga., in Pro. Per. Lawrence S. Camp, U. S. Atty., Harvey H. Tisinger, Asst. U. S. Atty., and H. T. Nichols, Sp. Atty., Dept. of Justice, all of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before FOSTER, .SIBLEY, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
